name: Shattered Earth (Godot Wild Jam #35)
description:
A huge space rock came from the sky oblirating the planet Earth. Ancients beings created massive constructs capable of healing earth.

You are Cristo Redentor the ancient construct tasked with operating the old machines.

Find these machines and mend the earth once again.

Goal
  • You jump across the platforms of the earth in order to get to the three World Wonders. 
  • Pull the levers, pulling the various platforms together. 
  • Complete the earth to win the game
Controls
  • A/D or left/right to move
  • W or up to jump
  • No there is no down
